Articles.Content:
![mars3_lander_vsm.jpg](http://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/image/spacecraft/mars3_lander_vsm.jpg)

The Mars 3 Lander was a Russian built lander that (I believe) was the first lander to ever land on mars. It was launched on May 28, 1971, and arrived in December 2, 1971.

However, once it landed and began operation, transmissions were cut 14.5 seconds later for unknown reasons.

The lander carried a little Prop-M rover that has a 15 meter umbilical.

![Mars_propm_rover.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5a/Mars_propm_rover.jpg)

I would really like to see someone make a mod out of this, I think it's a very neat looking lander.

Cheers! And I hope someone makes it!
Should this be in The Spacecraft Exchange?
OP mentions that he/she wants someone to make a mod out of Mars 3.
Yes, I wish for someone to make a mod out of this.
